name: Mini Farmer
description:
Hello! I'm Abigail, The developer of this game. I am 7 years old and this is the first ever game I've Published, its really nice to have this game made and I know you'll love it! I love crafting and art and making games which is why your reading this now. I made this game in four days for a farming game jam.

Mini Farmer is a Farming Game. You can get a pig, Plant, water and harvest and explore the beautiful map. You can talk to the shop keeper and get to know him. There are secrets hidden around the map so make sure to keep a close eye! But the most important thing I want you to do is... Have Fun!!!
